research_question: How much of ToT discriminability is explained by temporal ordering?

time_only.description: Deterministic within-subject clip order (first 25% vs last 25%) - This is a ceiling baseline, not a real model

our_model.note: Best performance across all baselines - outperforms Tiny-Deep, XGBoost, and SVM-RBF

answer: Our model achieves best performance across all baselines (F1=0.856 vs 0.823 Tiny-Deep, 0.689 XGBoost). Gap to temporal ceiling (0.144) shows temporal ordering is important but our LoRA+MoE approach captures additional physiological signals effectively.
temporal_dominance: STRONG - Temporal ordering explains most of ToT discriminability

acl_results.note: ACL shows strong physiology contribution (+0.157 F1), demonstrating multimodal approach is effective
